client_description_Summary_Note:
The RM has known González Martín since childhood, as their families have been close friends for many years. This long-standing relationship has fostered a deep trust and understanding between them.
With a career spanning nearly 44 years, González Martín has established himself as a key player in the industry.
He was impressed by Julius Baer's global presence and expertise in private banking, leading to the decision to join.
client_description_Family_Background: González Martín is currently divorced. He has 3 kids called Alejandra, Beatriz and Alba.
client_description_Education_Background:
González graduated from Colegio Jesús-María Tarragona in 1975.
González received his degree from Universidad Pontificia Comillas in 1981.
In 1983, he received extra education and graduated from IE University with an additional degree.
client_description_Occupation_History:
Having worked for over 44 years, González Martín brings a wealth of experience and expertise to his current role. He is known for his strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
González Martín launched his career as a Analyst at KKR Iberia Asesoramiento S.A., where he gained valuable experience from 1981 to 1986.
His subsequent role was as a Associate at Groupe Carlyle S.A.R.L., where he continued to grow professionally from 1988 to 1993.
At Apax Partners España S.A., he worked as a Investment Director from 1993 to 1994, focusing on strategic initiatives and team collaboration.
His next role was as a Partner at Groupe Carlyle S.A.R.L., where he applied his extensive experience to drive innovation from 1996 till retirement.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
He managed to save approximately 850000 EUR from his earnings at all companies.
His remarkable portfolio comprises 3 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Bilbao, Guadalajara and Cartagena, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.
He does not have any inheritances.
client_description_Client_Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
